SEARCH
Package controller

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
utils.Base
controller.BaseController
controller.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends BaseController
The ProjectController class manages the creation, modification, and retrieval of Project objects, as well as the assignment of projects to students and supervisors.
Since:
2023-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Khoo Yong Hui

    • getSubmittedProjects

      public ArrayList<Project> getSubmittedProjects(String supervisorID)
      Returns a list of all projects created by a given supervisor.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Project objects created by the given supervisor

    • setUnavailableProjects

      public void setUnavailableProjects(String supervisorID)
      Sets the status of projects supervised by a given supervisor to "unavailable" when the supervisor has reached their maximum allowed number of projects to supervise.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor

    • setAvailableProjects

      public void setAvailableProjects(String supervisorID)
      Sets the status of projects supervised by a given supervisor to "available" when the supervisor has capacity to supervise more projects.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor

    • validateAvailProjectID

      public boolean validateAvailProjectID(Integer projectID)
      Checks if a project ID corresponds to an available project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to validate
      Returns:
      true if the project is available, false otherwise

    • assignProject

      public boolean assignProject(Integer projectID, String studentID)
      Assigns a project to a student and updates its status accordingly.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to assign
      studentID - the ID of the student to assign the project to
      Returns:
      true if the project's supervisor has reached their maximum allowed number of projects to supervise, false otherwise

    • changeTitle

      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to modify
      newTitle - the new title of the project

    • getProjectsByFilter

      public ArrayList<Integer> getProjectsByFilter(int status, String supervisorID)
      Returns a list of project IDs based on a chosen filter
      Parameters:
      status - the status of the projects to filter by
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor to filter by
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of project IDs that match the given status and supervisor

    • changeSupervisor

      public boolean changeSupervisor(Integer projectID, String newSupervisorID)
      Changes the supervisor of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to modify
      newSupervisorID - the ID of the new supervisor
      Returns:
      true if the new supervisor has reached their maximum allowed number of projects to supervise, false otherwise

    • unassignProject

      public boolean unassignProject(Integer projectID, String studentID)
      Unassigns a project from a student and updates its status accordingly.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to unassign
      studentID - the ID of the student to unassign the project from
      Returns:
      true if the project's supervisor has reached their maximum allowed number of projects to supervise, false otherwise

    • getSupervisorIDFromProjectID

      public String getSupervisorIDFromProjectID(Integer projectID)
      Returns the supervisor ID associated with a given project ID.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to retrieve the supervisor ID for
      Returns:
      the supervisor ID associated with the given project ID, or null if no such project exists

    • modifyProjectTitle

      public boolean modifyProjectTitle(Integer projectID, String newTitle, String supervisorID)
      Modifies the title of a project with a given ID, but only if the user requesting the modification is the supervisor who created the project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to modify
      newTitle - the new title to assign to the project
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor requesting the modification
      Returns:
      true if the project title was successfully modified, false otherwise

      Returns:

      Creates a new project with the given parameters and adds it to the system.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor who will be responsible for the new project
      projectTitle - the title of the new project
      status - the status code of the new project

    • getProjects

      public ArrayList<Integer> getProjects(String type)
      Returns a list of project IDs of a given type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of project IDs to retrieve (either "available" or any other value to retrieve all projects)
      Returns:
      an Arraylist of project IDs of the given type
